Dirk, I am having trouble reproducing this.  Do you have any additional steps 
to reproduce?

No, unfortunatelly not. It happend two times to me. In both cases it was the 
second debug session I started after starting eclipse. The symptoms were as 
follows:

- debugger stop at a breakpoint
- the thread got suspended but the debugger view did not show the stack trace. 
The thread was only marked as suspended without any children.
- pressing step into, step over, or stop out poped up an error dialog, saying 
that there has been an exception
- resume still worked

Sorry for not putting this in when I filed the PR.
